patient_info: Papilledema,Hepatic steatosis,Myocardial infarction,Coronary artery atherosclerosis,Splenomegaly,Thrombocytosis,Pulmonary arterial hypertension,Increased circulating IgA level,Difficulty climbing stairs,Osteoporosis of vertebrae,Dilatation of the ventricular cavity,Demyelinating motor neuropathy,Lower limb muscle weakness,Demyelinating sensory neuropathy,Left anterior fascicular block,Abnormal granulocytopoietic cell morphology,Dysesthesia,Abasia,Left ventricular diastolic dysfunction,Left atrial enlargement,Abnormal peripheral nerve morphology by anatomical site,Abnormal thoracic spine morphology
golden_diagnosis: POEMS 综合征/POEMS syndrome/POEMS syndrome,POEMS 综合征/POEMS syndrome/POEMS syndrome
predict_diagnosis:
1. Mixed connective tissue disease (MCTD) with cardiac and neurological involvement
2. Primary systemic amyloidosis with cardiomyopathy and neuropathy
3. Chronic inflammatory demyelinating polyneuropathy (CIDP) with associated cardiomyopathy
4. Hypereosinophilic syndrome with multi-organ involvement, including heart and nerves
5. Storage disorders (e.g., Fabry disease) with myocardial and neuropathic manifestations
6. POEMS syndrome (Polyneuropathy, Organomegaly, Endocrinopathy, Monoclonal protein, Skin changes)
7. Endomyocardial fibrosis with associated pulmonary arterial hypertension and neuropathy
8. Metabolic syndrome with myocardial infarction, hepatic steatosis, and peripheral neuropathy
9. Hereditary hemorrhagic telangiectasia (HHT) with pulmonary arterial hypertension and neurological symptoms
10. Mitochondrial disease with multi-system involvement, including cardiomyopathy and neuropathy.
